Try plugging in your midi keyboard!

The Scotchillator 4201 is a project I developed following my interested in how to use MIDI in the browser. Once I learned how to access the myriad midi controllers usually connected to my computer, I began experimenting with what sort of sound generation options I had with the Web Audio API.

That's when I discovered Tone.js, a Javascript library built on the Web Audio API That allows developers to access familiar audio properties like wave forms, delay and reverb.
